name: Eddy
author: Nipype (interface), Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB) (tool)
description: Eddy, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: Eddy).

inputs.name: Cnr maps
inputs.description: A boolean. Output cnr-maps.

inputs.name: Dont peas
inputs.description: A boolean. Do not perform a post-eddy alignment of shells.

inputs.name: Dont sep offs move
inputs.description: A boolean. Do not attempt to separate field offset from subject movement.

inputs.name: Fep
inputs.description: A boolean. Fill empty planes in x- or y-directions.

inputs.name: Field
inputs.description: A unicode string. Nontopup fieldmap scaled in hz - filename has to be provided without an extension. topup is strongly recommended.

inputs.name: Field mat
inputs.description: An existing file name. Matrix that specifies the relative locations of the field specified by --field and first volume in file --imain.

inputs.name: Flm
inputs.description: 'linear' or 'quadratic' or 'cubic'. First level ec model.

inputs.name: Fudge factor
inputs.description: A float. Fudge factor for hyperparameter error variance.

inputs.name: Fwhm
inputs.description: A float. Fwhm for conditioning filter when estimating the parameters.

inputs.name: In acqp
inputs.description: An existing file name. File containing acquisition parameters.

inputs.name: In bval
inputs.description: An existing file name. File containing the b-values for all volumes in --imain.

inputs.name: In bvec
inputs.description: An existing file name. File containing the b-vectors for all volumes in --imain.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: An existing file name. File containing all the images to estimate distortions for.

inputs.name: In index
inputs.description: An existing file name. File containing indices for all volumes in --imain into --acqp and --topup.

inputs.name: In mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. Mask to indicate brain.

inputs.name: In topup fieldcoef
inputs.description: An existing file name. Topup file containing the field coefficients.

inputs.name: In topup movpar
inputs.description: An existing file name. Topup movpar.txt file.

inputs.name: Interp
inputs.description: 'spline' or 'trilinear'. Interpolation model for estimation step.

inputs.name: Is shelled
inputs.description: A boolean. Override internal check to ensure that date are acquired on a set of b-value shells.

inputs.name: Method
inputs.description: 'jac' or 'lsr'. Final resampling method (jacobian/least squares).

inputs.name: Niter
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Number of iterations.

inputs.name: Num threads
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Number of openmp threads to use.

inputs.name: Nvoxhp
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). # of voxels used to estimate the hyperparameters.

inputs.name: Out base
inputs.description: A unicode string. Basename for output (warped) image.

inputs.name: Repol
inputs.description: A boolean. Detect and replace outlier slices.

inputs.name: Residuals
inputs.description: A boolean. Output residuals.

inputs.name: Session
inputs.description: An existing file name. File containing session indices for all volumes in --imain.

inputs.name: Slm
inputs.description: 'none' or 'linear' or 'quadratic'. Second level ec model.

inputs.name: Use cuda
inputs.description: A boolean. Run eddy using cuda gpu.

output-files.name: Out cnr maps
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the cnr_maps.

output-files.name: Out corrected
output-files.description: An existing file name. 4d image file containing all the corrected volumes.

output-files.name: Out movement rms
output-files.description: An existing file name. Summary of the "total movement" in each volume.

output-files.name: Out outlier report
output-files.description: An existing file name. Text-file with a plain language report on what outlier slices eddy has found.

output-files.name: Out parameter
output-files.description: An existing file name. Text file with parameters definining the field andmovement for each scan.

output-files.name: Out residuals
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the residuals.

output-files.name: Out restricted movement rms
output-files.description: An existing file name. Summary of the "total movement" in each volume disregarding translation in the pe direction.

output-files.name: Out rotated bvecs
output-files.description: An existing file name. File containing rotated b-values for all volumes.

output-files.name: Out shell alignment parameters
output-files.description: An existing file name. File containing rigid body movement parameters between the different shells as estimated by a post-hoc mutual information based registration.
